head.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Easily extract specific pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file using {{ProdFullName}} and save them as a new document.

header.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to enhance your {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced page extraction features for {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive document processing library that supports over 50 formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images. It allows you to merge, split, extract, rearrange, and delete pages with ease.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers powerful features for handling over 50 widely used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, Excel sheets, images, and archives into a single document with flexible options.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Reorder, move, or remove pages to refine and organize your documents efficiently.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientation as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract only the necessary pages, saving them as a standalone document.

formats.title: Extract pages from multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling seamless document processing.

examples.comment_2: Set up options to extract specific pages
examples.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to extract pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Add seamless document processing to your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Provide the file path of the source {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Choose the pages you want to extract.
content.step_4: Save the extracted pages as a new document.

code_1.title: Extract specific pages from a document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to extract a selected range of pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file and save them as a new document.
code_1.comment_1: Specify the path to the source document
code_1.comment_2: Set extraction options to include only even-numbered pages within a range
code_1.comment_4: Save the extracted pages to a new file
